channel.title: Client 525 help please
channel.description:
i have given out my client for my 525 server but it wont let others log on could some 1 help me...i tried to go to loader.java but still no use.
when people try and get on my server they get this error....."error_game-js5connect"

item.title: Client 525 help please
item.dc:creator: @farrukhrockz farrukhrockz
item.description:
@farrukhrockz wrote:

why dont you try to connect with the ip from your comp see if that work and andrew is rite check if you pfed correctly

Read full topic

item.title: Client 525 help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This is not caused by your client it is caused by the ip address your running it on. Try to re-port forward since your ip address changes from time to time and makes it imposable for people to log in. Look up some guides on port forwarding if you need help or get the new easy port forwarder

Read full topic
